name: chat-stream-ts
description: A typeScript class for llama.cpp chat stream

scripts.server: npm run build && cd dist && node ./controller/controller.js --model=openchat --server
scripts.chat: npm run build && cd dist && node ./controller/controller.js
scripts.int-test: npm run build && cd dist && node single.js tinyllama "" "what is 2+2?" >> int-test.log && grep -q "4" int-test.log && echo "int test OK" || echo "int test FAILED"
scripts.copy-files: npx ncp src/settings.json dist/settings.json && npx ncp src/public_html dist/public_html
scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && npm run copy-files && node updateImports.js

author: Ivan Kouznetsov
